sentences.sContent: The rabbit disappeared in the bushes.
sentences.sCn: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.sContent: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.sContent_eng: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.sCn: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.sContent: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.sCn: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

phrases.pCn: 兔耳（好奇凡事都想知道）；室内天线

trans.tranOther: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground
